---
title: "Reservoir Sampling"
author: "Liam Childs"
date: "10 March 2016"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

data = read.table('/tmp/reservoir.txt', header=T)
for (n in unique(data$n)) {
  p = data %>%
    filter(n == n) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=item, y=count)) +
    geom_point(size=1) +
    facet_wrap(~k)
  print(p)
}
```
